content.p: There are two options made available for your convenience to make a donation towards the cause. Option 1 : Donate Online Option 2 : Mail in cheque with donation form. Use ONLY one of the options to make a donation for the cause. OPTION 1 : Donate online Step 1 : Click to Donate Online and select Lifecycle Event from the drop down menu. Step 2 : Upon making your online donation, take note of the Approval Code on the online official receipt as you will be required to provide this code to complete this process. Step 3 : Click to complete your ONLINE DONATIONS for the cause. You will need to have completed Step 1 and 2 before proceeding to Step 3. OPTION 2 : PAYMENT BY CHEQUE Step 1 : Download hard copy of Donations Form. Step 2 : Fill in the Donations Form and ensure cheque number is provided in the form. Step 3 : Write cheque payable to "The University of Nottingham in Malaysia Sdn Bhd". Step 4 : Mail cheque along with completed Donations Form to : ATTN : Salinee Ganeson Alumni and Donor Relations The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul EhsanMalaysia telephone: +603 8924 8000 fax: +603 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
